text:
OT compensation at a
rate not less than one and one-half times the regular rate of pay must be paid
as follows:                                    


 
  
   
  
  
  Maids and custodial workers in hotels and motels
  
  
  All restaurant workers and other employees of hotels
  and motels
  
 
 
  
  Date effective
  
  
  (Old Sec 13(b)(8)(B)
  
  
  (Old Sec 13(b)(8)(A)
  
 
 
  
   
  
  
   
  
  
   
  
 
 
  
  5/1/76
  
  
  OT after 44 hours
  
  
  OT after 46 hours
  
 
 
  
  5/1/77
  
  
  OT after 40 hours
  
  
  OT after 46 hours
  
 
 
  
  1/1/78
  
  
  OT after 40 hours
  
  
  OT after 44 hours
  
 
 
  
  1/1/79
  
  
  OT after 40 hours
  
  
  OT after 40 hours
html:
OT compensation at a rate not less than one and one-half times the regular rate of pay must be paid as follows:

                                   

 

Maids and custodial workers in hotels and motels

All restaurant workers and other employees of hotels and motels

Date effective

(Old Sec 13(b)(8)(B)

(Old Sec 13(b)(8)(A)

 

 

 

5/1/76

OT after 44 hours

OT after 46 hours

5/1/77

OT after 40 hours

OT after 46 hours

1/1/78

OT after 40 hours

OT after 44 hours

1/1/79

OT after 40 hours

OT after 40 hours
